remarks: Rule used to change bound variables in an ordered-pair class abstraction, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2003.)
statement:
cbvopab.1 $e |- F/ z ph $.
cbvopab.2 $e |- F/ w ph $.
cbvopab.3 $e |- F/ x ps $.
cbvopab.4 $e |- F/ y ps $.
cbvopab.5 $e |- ( ( x = z /\ y = w ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvopab $p |- { <. x , y >. | ph } = { <. z , w >. | ps } $.
$d w x y z $.
